P4956 [COCI2017-2018#6] Davor

Written on December 26th, 2024 by ZJM 
#include<iostream>
#include<cmath>
using namespace std;
int a[10001];
int main()
{
    int n;
    cin>>n;
    n/=52;
    n/=7;
    int ans=0;
    if(n>100)
    {
        while(n>100)
        {
            n-=3;
            ans+=1;
        }
        cout<<n<<endl<<ans;
    }
    else
        cout<<n-3<<endl<<1;
    return 0;
}
